item.title: Polynesian Fire Luau and Dinner Show Ticket in Myrtle Beach
item.description:
Polynesian Fire Luau is one of the hottest shows in Myrtle Beach. The entertainment event features performers from different Polynesian Isles, just for the Luau. Your evening begins with a lei greeting by dancers.
Then enjoy a buffet dinner accompanied with live music by our Polynesian band! After dinner, the show which highlights songs and dances from the different Polynesian cultures of Hawaii, Tahiti, Tonga, New Zealand and Samoa, begins. The night ends with an amazing performance by our World Champion Samoan Fire Knife Team.
All guests must arrive at St John's Inn 6803 N Ocean Blvd, Myrtle Beach no later than 6pm to check-in.

image.alt: Polynesian Fire Luau and Dinner Show Ticket in Myrtle Beach

item.title: Waccamaw River Nature and Wildlife Tour
item.description: Explore the beautiful cypress-lined Waccamaw River, Intracoastal Waterway, and the creeks and swamps on this guided boat tour near Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. Be on the lookout for birds and other wildlife that inhabit these southern waters that run along the refuge. The boat docks are located within Waccatee Zoo.

image.alt: Waccamaw River Nature and Wildlife Tour

item.title: Original Motown Tribute Show
item.description: Enjoy a musical journey through the history of Motown during this cabaret revue at the GTS Theatre in Myrtle Beach. Hear classic songs like “Dancing in the Streets” as performers pay tribute to legends such as Diana Ross, The Four Tops, Martha & the Vandellas, Stevie Wonder, the Temptations, Marvin Gaye, Jackson 5, Lionel Richie, Gladys Knight, and more.

image.alt: Original Motown Tribute Show

item.title: Legends in Concert Myrtle Beach Admission
item.description: See some of the most popular acts in the history of music on one stage at the Legends in Concert show at Myrtle Beach. Catch celebrity look-a-likes perform the songs and dances of legendary stars such as Elvis Presley, Madonna, and Michael Jackson, to name just a few. Enjoy five musical acts in one evening at the Legends Theater, a state-of-the-art theater located in the heart of Myrtle Beach at Broadway at the Beach. Each season features a new lineup of tributes to today's and yesterday's greatest musical legends.

image.alt: Legends in Concert Myrtle Beach Admission

item.title: 2-Hour Guided Segway Tour of Huntington Beach State Park in Myrtle Beach
item.description: Huntington Beach State Park in Myrtle Beach is a must-visit for outdoor enthusiasts. Explore the wetland and wildlife preserve with ease on a Segway tour, alongside a small group of fellow nature lovers. Glide through the park with ease on your Segway and observe local wildlife like loggerhead turtles, alligators, various bird species, and perhaps a mink. After the tour, you can visit the Moorish-style Atalaya castle on your own.

image.alt: 2-Hour Guided Segway Tour of Huntington Beach State Park in Myrtle Beach

item.title: Charles Bach Wonders Magic and Illusion Show
item.description: Enjoy an exceptional performance of magic and more during a 1.5-hour show at Broadway at the Beach. Charles Bach, a veteran of Caesars Palace in Las Vegas and the Magic Castle in Hollywood, comes to Myrtle Beach to take you on a non-stop thrill ride. Combining illusion, dance, and comedy into one night, there's something to satisfy everyone in your party.

image.alt: Charles Bach Wonders Magic and Illusion Show

item.title: Magic & Comedy Show Starring Michael Bairefoot
item.description: Families and groups will enjoy this fun-for-all-ages magic and comedy show in Myrtle Beach. Buying your tickets ahead of time guarantees your admission and eliminates the disappointment of sold-out days or times. Watch a show that combines music, magic, and comedy in one for a fun-filled evening of laughter.

image.alt: Magic & Comedy Show Starring Michael Bairefoot

item.title: Surf Lessons in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
item.description: While enjoying the fun and sun in Myrtle Beach, take some time for a lesson in surfing, tailored to fit all ages and skill levels. Learn the basics of proper form and ocean safety from a professional surf instructor that is both CPR- and first aid-certified. After some stretching, head to the water and discover how to paddle and catch waves. The instructor remains in the water through the end of the lesson, making students feel at home while attending to every learning need.

image.alt: Surf Lessons in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina

item.title: Steve Falcon's Comedy Hypnosis Hour
item.description: Watch the hilarious Steve Falcon use his hypnosis skills to put on a rousing show right in the heart of Myrtle Beach. Head to the Charles Bach Wonders Theatre and enjoy a hysterical show featuring comedy, sound effects, top production value, and, of course, hypnosis. No two shows are the same!

image.alt: Steve Falcon's Comedy Hypnosis Hour

item.title: 2 Hour Semi-Private Surf Lesson
item.description: The 2 Hour Semi-private surf Lesson is perfect for the family or your group of friends. Considering the laughter of all the wipe-outs and horrays of all the success you will have in the water, this is a sure way to create a memory that will last a lifetime. Come surf with us and enjoy the day!

image.alt: 2 Hour Semi-Private Surf Lesson

item.title: Kayak Salt Marsh Maze Tour
item.description: Explore the hidden gem of North Myrtle Beach's salt marsh and island preserve. On our eco-tours, a knowledgeable guide will show you through the natural habitat and take you to the best parts where you can view and hold local wildlife like hermit crabs and other crustaceans, hunt for seashells, enjoy playing in the water, and the best views this place has to offer. Great for all ages 3 and up!

image.alt: Kayak Salt Marsh Maze Tour

item.title: The Escape Game at Broadway at the Beach in Myrtle Beach
item.description:
The Escape Game Myrtle Beach has five dynamic escape games with immersive themes and set designs. Featured is the newest escape game Timeliner: Train Through Time which challenges players to zigzag across the past, present, and future! Each multi-room experience can accommodate up to 8 players.
Our South Carolina location sits at Broadway at the Beach right next to an awesome assortment of eating and entertainment options. Some of our top spots to eat in the area are Extreme Pizza, Yamato, and Margaritaville.
These adventures offer a one-of-a-kind premium experience. Follow clues and solve puzzles to complete your mission together. We offer the best escape rooms and the fastest customer support. Come see why our escape rooms win awards.

image.alt: The Escape Game at Broadway at the Beach in Myrtle Beach

item.title: Myrtle Beach History, Movies and Music Trolley Tour
item.description: Discover Myrtle Beach’s history from the mid-20th century to today, including its role in film and music, as you travel through the city on a historic trolley. Visit Charlie’s Place Historic Site, part of the Chitlin' Circuit, and a Green Book-listed motel, where several famous artists performed between the 1930s and 1960s While you ride, learn about the city’s rich music and movie history that began in the mid-20th century.

image.alt: Myrtle Beach History, Movies and Music Trolley Tour

item.title: Music and Memories at Greg Rowles Legacy Theatre
item.description: Your ticket gets you access to the most amazing, moving, and electric show on the Grand Strand! Experience entertainment like never before.

image.alt: Music and Memories at Greg Rowles Legacy Theatre

item.title: Walking Dead Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
item.description: This The Walking Dead Escape Room in Myrtle Beach is a fun activity for families, groups, or just fans of the hit TV show. You’ll rush the clock to help others solve clues and puzzles related to a zombie-themed game. During your time, try your best to make it out in time as your supplies keep disappearing and zombies hunt you one by one.

image.alt: Walking Dead Escape Room in Myrtle Beach

item.title: Murder Mystery Dinner Show in Myrtle Beach
item.description: Join us on this1930's mobster-themed murder mystery dinner show, where you will dine and try to figure out who the killer is, why and how they did it. Come and have fun with us.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Dinner Show in Myrtle Beach

item.title: Original Motown Christmas Tribute Show
item.description: Get in the holiday spirit in Myrtle Beach with a ticket to the Motown Christmas Tribute Show. Attend this musical cabaret revue featuring performances inspired by musicians such as Diana Ross, Stevie Wonder, Marvin Gaye, and the Jackson 5. See a Motown show with a holiday twist during a trip to Myrtle Beach at the GTS Theatre.

image.alt: Original Motown Christmas Tribute Show

item.title: Day Trips to Charleston#7 See Ft Sumter,CarriageTour,Lunch & more
item.description: Escape beach crowds of Myrtle Beach and embark on a day trip to Charleston and Fort Sumter. Experience the best of Charleston as you explore the historic district in a horse-drawn carriage, shop in the city market, and enjoy a boat ride around Charleston Harbor. Then, head to Fort Sumter for a pass by to the national monument as well as a tour of Boone Hall Plantation.

image.alt: Day Trips to Charleston#7 See Ft Sumter,CarriageTour,Lunch & more

item.title: Elton John Tribute Show
item.description: Add some musical cabaret to your Myrtle Beach trip with a ticket to the Elton John Tribute Show. Join music lovers of all ages for this concert including classic Elton John hits performed by impressionist Bill Connors. See a convincing impersonation of Elton John as you sing along to hit songs like Rocket Man and Tiny Dancer. Drinks and snacks are available for purchase.

image.alt: Elton John Tribute Show

item.title: Segway Tour at the North Myrtle Beach Sports Complex
item.description:
This Segway Experience is not your typical city tour. This Segway tour is different than other tours because here at the PARK, there is no weaving in and out of traffic, and you get to experience the Segway on miles of open trails. This tour is great for beginners as well as the experienced Segway rider! You with get hands on training as well as safety demonstrations by your tour guide. Tours begin only when everyone feels comfortable on their Segway. We will ride on a variety of trails which include pavement, sand, coquina and a back in the woods trail. This is an adventure which is good for the entire family. We can take pics and videos for you as we take you on an all terrain adventure. We fill up fast so BOOK NOW!!
Tour is approximately 6-8 miles long.
Once your tour is complete, North Myrtle Beach Sports Complex offers Walking/Biking Trails, Picnic Shelters, Playgrounds, Dog Parks for use at your leisure!

image.alt: Segway Tour at the North Myrtle Beach Sports Complex

item.title: Myrtle Beach to Charleston with Horse & Carriage Ride, Harbor Cruise, Boone Hall
item.description: Enjoy a scenic journey to one of America's greatest historic treasures—Charleston, South Carolina, for a day of sightseeing, shopping, and dining. Experience the highlights of Charleston on a full sightseeing day trip from Myrtle Beach. Tour package includes a boxed lunch, a ride through the historic district in a traditional horse-drawn carriage, Charleston Harbor boat tour, a visit to Boone Hall Plantation with a guided tour, and a brief stop at the Old City Market.

image.alt: Myrtle Beach to Charleston with Horse & Carriage Ride, Harbor Cruise, Boone Hall

item.title: Day Trip to Charleston#5: Bus Tour,Boone Hall, City Market, Lunch
item.description: Save time and money when you book this day trip from Myrtle Beach to Charleston. This perfectly packaged tour allows you to discover the best of the southern city for less than if you traveled there on your own. Enjoy a guided tour of Charleton’s historic district in a tour bus, a visit to Boone Hall Plantation, plus free time to explore Charleston on your own.

image.alt: Day Trip to Charleston#5: Bus Tour,Boone Hall, City Market, Lunch

item.title: Guided Myrtle Beach Kayak
item.description: Myrtle Beach may be known for its lively boardwalk, crowded beaches, and rocking amusement park, but when it’s time to spend some quiet time out on the water, there’s no better way to do it than a sunrise or sunset kayak tour. Locals guides will lead you through the calm waters of Murrells Inlet, which teems with wildlife like birds, fish, and sea turtles. All equipment is included and souvenir photos are available to purchase.

image.alt: Guided Myrtle Beach Kayak

item.title: Myrtle Beach Area Ghosts, Pirates and Historic Families Trolley Tour
item.description: Uncover Myrtle Beach’s eerie past aboard a trolley bus on this history tour. Climb aboard the enclosed vehicle and travel south to Murrells Inlet, listening to local ghost and pirate stories along the way. Learn about the historic families who lived in the area and pass by several historic landmarks that are purported to be haunted before heading back to Myrtle Beach.

image.alt: Myrtle Beach Area Ghosts, Pirates and Historic Families Trolley Tour
